alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 23 at 3:43AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Valley and Greeley Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy conditions continue this morning with a steady north to northwest wind. Combined with subzero temperatures, dangerously cold wind chills are expected through the morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
